history.narrative: Law 1-111, the “Fire Department Operations Act of 1976,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-377, which was referred to the Committee on Public Safety. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 27, 1976, and September 15, 1976, respectively. Enacted without signature by the Mayor on January 7, 1977, it was assigned Act. No. 1-198 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
